Species.Name: Lasat
Species.Description: [H4]Lasat[h4] Please see page 19 of the Allies and Adversaries Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Brawl
Option.Description: Lasats begin the game with one rank in either Brawl or Knowledge (Lore). They still may not train either skill above rank 2 during character creation.

Option.Name: Knowledge (Lore)
Option.Description: Lasats begin the game with one rank in either Brawl or Knowledge (Lore). They still may not train either skill above rank 2 during character creation.

Option.Name: Prehensile Feet
Option.Description: Lasats can move along a vertical surface as if the surface was horizontal.
